miic.core.macro.plot_dvs_macro¶

plot_dvs_macro(base_dir='.', save_dir='./img')[source]¶

Plot all correlation matrixes stored in a folder as .mat file

This is a basic function to plot the velocity change dv dictionaries stored in a folder as .mat files. It loads each dictionary, check if their content is in agreement with the presumed structure and the plot it.

Parameters:
  • base_dir (directory) – Where the auto-cross correlation matrix are stored
  • save_dir (directory) – Directory where to save the resulting images
